data.actual_result: The Song continues to be shown in my profile until I close the Application on my phone.
data.expected_result: The Song disappears from my Profile. Like it does when using the Spotify Desktop Client.
data.short_description: Playing a Song on Spotify on Phone and Pausing it still shows song in profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a song on Spotify on your phone - Pause the song
